text: aur yaad karo jab ke hum ne aap se farma diya ke aap ke rub ne logo ko gher liya hai, jo ruya(aini ruiyyath3) hum ne aap ko dikhaai thi wo logo ke liye saaf aazmaayish hee thi, aur isi tarah wo daraqth bhi jis se Qur’aan mein iz’haare nafrath kiya gaya hai hum unhe dara rahe hai, lekin ye unhe aur badi sarkashi mein bada raha hai
